text: Mulan is funny, beautifully animated, and features one of the most courageous and loyal Disney characters out there. In preparation for your weekend viewing, here are 13 things you might not know about this beloved film : 1. Mulan took five years to complete. 2. It took 700 animators, artists, and technicians to complete the film. 3. They brewed 1, 630 pounds of coffee during production. 4. The directors, Tony Bancroft and Barry Cook, made a cameo towards the end of the film. 5. The character of Cri - Kee was championed by the late Joe Grant, who was one of the oldest Disney animators at the time ( he worked on Snow White and the Seven Dwarfs ).
